import React from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { requestProduct } from '../redux/actions/productsActions' const RequestProduct = () => { const { register, handleSubmit, reset } = useForm() const dispatch = useDispatch() const onSubmit = (data) => { let updatedData = { ...data, price: parseInt(data.price), ratings: parseInt(data.ratings), stock: parseInt(data.stock), } dispatch(addProducts(updatedData)) setTimeout(() => reset(), 5000) } return (

) } export default RequestProduct
